document.full_text: yemeni forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh opened fire on protesters in the southern city of taiz on sunday, killing at least six people and wounding 120, hospital sources said.
document.title: six killed as yemeni forces fire at protesters in taiz
lines_and_colors: yemeni forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh opened fire on protesters in the southern city of taiz on sunday, killing at least six people and wounding 120, hospital sources said.
